text: GAL is a 2006 Spanish drama film directed by Miguel Courtois. Inspired by true events, GAL tells the investigation by journalists on the anti-terrorist GAL death squads established illegally by officials of the Spanish government to fight ETA. == Cast == * José Garcia - Manuel Mallo * Natalia Verbeke - Marta Castillo * Jordi Mollà - Paco Ariza * Ana Álvarez - Soledad Muñoz * - Gracia * - Pablo Codina == References == == External links == * Category:2006 drama films Category:Spanish films
title: GAL (film)
